name: Flippin Golf
description:
This is my entry into the Spring 2019 #ue4jam, Flippin' Golf. You hit your ball through each hole to progress through the map. There are many paths and dangers you'll encounter when progressing through the game. You goal is to get to the final hole with the least amount of points. Challenge your friends to see who can get the lowest score!

Assets not made by me:

  1. Village assets, trees, rocks from Advanced Village Pack.
  2. Music from Retro 8Bit Sounds Pack.
